program_track: ## Data Analytics Program with Generative AI
program_brief: Designed based on 65+ job descriptions and 400+ interview questions.

rtb_content.rtb_title: ##### Built for Beginners, Designed for Employability
rtbs: - No coding or analytics background needed
- Designed based on analysis of JDs and Interviews

rtb_content.rtb_title: ##### Progressive: One task at a time

rtbs: - Equips you with skills before capstone
- Use GenAI tools for data analysis
- Mentors who are invested in your success
- Learn to work in small teams

projects.project_title: Analyze Social Media to Find Trends (MarTech)
projects.brief_description: Use Excel to decode social media trends for virality.
projects.detailed_description: Analyze and visualize social media engagement data to uncover trending topics, audience preferences, and sentiment insights. Present findings using dashboards and storytelling techniques that make data engaging and easy to interpret.
projects.core_features: Collect and organize social media data,Create interactive Excel dashboards,Use PivotCharts for trend visualization,Apply storytelling principles to data insights

projects.project_title: Analyse Medical Data for Smarter Healthcare Decisions (MedTech)
projects.brief_description: Analyze hospital data with SQL for better decision-making.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a relational database for hospital operations to manage patient records, appointments, staff details, and treatments. Use SQL queries and stored procedures to efficiently retrieve and analyze medical data.
projects.core_features: Design ER diagrams for hospital workflows,Create and normalize relational tables,Develop SQL queries and stored procedures,Generate analytical reports on patient and staff data

projects.project_title: Console-Based Finance Tracker for Smarter Savings (FinTech)
projects.brief_description: Use Python to build a finance app for smarter spending.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a Python-based financial tracker that helps users record, categorize, and analyze expenses. Implement data structures and file handling to store and process financial data efficiently.
projects.core_features: Add, update, and delete expense records,Categorize expenses automatically,Generate monthly and category-wise reports,Store data persistently using file handling

projects.project_title: Perform EDA on Consumer Data for an E-commerce Platform (CommerceTech)
projects.brief_description: Explore and visualize to uncover patterns that drive better business decisions
projects.detailed_description: Analyze e-commerce transaction data to identify patterns in user behavior, popular product categories, and conversion trends. Use Python and visualization tools to derive insights that support marketing strategies.
projects.core_features: Clean and preprocess e-commerce datasets,Perform exploratory data analysis with Pandas,Visualize buying behavior using Seaborn,Identify customer segments and sales drivers

projects.project_title: Extract and Visualize Insights from Sports Data for the Business (SportsTech)
projects.brief_description: Build Power BI dasboards to track sports performance trends and players' statistics.
projects.detailed_description: Build interactive Power BI dashboards that visualize key sales and revenue metrics. Use Power Query and DAX to clean, transform, and model data for actionable business intelligence.
projects.core_features: Integrate data from multiple business sources,Model relationships between datasets,Create KPIs and measures using DAX,Design interactive, visually appealing dashboards

projects.project_title: Build Dashboard to View Performance at-a-Glance (LogiTech)
projects.brief_description: Combining all skills perform EDA, build dashboard, and recommend insights to improve delivery efficiency.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a complete analytics solution that combines data collection, cleaning, analysis, and machine learning to forecast product demand. Use Python, SQL, Power BI, and Excel for an integrated approach to business intelligence and predictive modeling.
projects.core_features: Collect and integrate data from multiple business sources,Clean and preprocess sales and inventory data,Visualize predictions with Power BI dashboards,Use GenAI tools for report generation and insights

rtbs: - Use AI tools for data analysis
- Building a Finance Tracker Console App in Python

projects.project_title: Social Media Trends Discovering Stories Behind the Data
projects.brief_description: Analyse social media data, tell visual stories, and capture insights.
projects.detailed_description: Analyze and visualize social media engagement data to uncover trending topics, audience preferences, and sentiment insights. Present findings using dashboards and storytelling techniques that make data engaging and easy to interpret.
projects.core_features: Collect and organize social media data,Create interactive Excel dashboards,Use PivotCharts for trend visualization,Apply storytelling principles to data insights

projects.project_title: Managing and Analyzing Patient Data with SQL
projects.brief_description: Design, manage, and analyze patient data.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a relational database for hospital operations to manage patient records, appointments, staff details, and treatments. Use SQL queries and stored procedures to efficiently retrieve and analyze medical data.
projects.core_features: Design ER diagrams for hospital workflows,Create and normalize relational tables,Develop SQL queries and stored procedures,Generate analytical reports on patient and staff data

projects.project_title: Building a Finance Tracker Console App in Python
projects.brief_description: Build a smart finance tracker on daily expenses.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a Python-based financial tracker that helps users record, categorize, and analyze expenses. Implement data structures and file handling to store and process financial data efficiently.
projects.core_features: Add, update, and delete expense records,Categorize expenses automatically,Generate monthly and category-wise reports,Store data persistently using file handling

projects.project_title: E-commerce Shopper Behavior Analysis using Python
projects.brief_description: Explore shopper patterns to uncover insights that drive sales.
projects.detailed_description: Analyze e-commerce transaction data to identify patterns in user behavior, popular product categories, and conversion trends. Use Python and visualization tools to derive insights that support marketing strategies.
projects.core_features: Clean and preprocess e-commerce datasets,Perform exploratory data analysis with Pandas,Visualize buying behavior using Seaborn,Identify customer segments and sales drivers

projects.project_title: Sales and Revenue Insights for Business Stakeholders
projects.brief_description: Turn business data into powerful, insight-rich dashboards.
projects.detailed_description: Build interactive Power BI dashboards that visualize key sales and revenue metrics. Use Power Query and DAX to clean, transform, and model data for actionable business intelligence.
projects.core_features: Integrate data from multiple business sources,Model relationships between datasets,Create KPIs and measures using DAX,Design interactive, visually appealing dashboards

projects.project_title: Banking Customer Churn Analytics for Marketing Teams
projects.brief_description: Identify customers at risk of leaving and boost retention.
projects.detailed_description: Analyze customer behavior data to predict churn using statistical and machine learning techniques. Apply hypothesis testing and inferential statistics to validate patterns and suggest retention strategies.
projects.core_features: Preprocess customer and transaction data,Perform statistical tests and correlation analysis,Build and evaluate churn prediction models,Recommend strategies to improve retention

projects.project_title: Delivery Performance Analysis for Logistics Managers
projects.brief_description: Predict product demand to optimize stock and boost business efficiency.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a complete analytics solution that combines data collection, cleaning, analysis, and machine learning to forecast product demand. Use Python, SQL, Power BI, and Excel for an integrated approach to business intelligence and predictive modeling.
projects.core_features: Collect and integrate data from multiple business sources,Clean and preprocess sales and inventory data,Build machine learning models to forecast demand,Visualize predictions with Power BI dashboards,Use GenAI tools for report generation and insights

projects.project_title: Retail Sales Prediction for Marketing and Supply Chain Teams
projects.brief_description: Predict product sales and trends to guide marketing and supply chain.

projects.project_title: Social Media Sentiment and Trend Forecasting
projects.brief_description: Forecast trends and analyze social media sentiment for marketing decisions.

projects.project_title: Medical Image Classification for Healthcare Diagnostics
projects.brief_description: Classify medical images to support accurate healthcare diagnosis decisions.

projects.project_title: Smart City Traffic Analytics for Urban Planners
projects.brief_description: Use AI to forecast traffic trends and optimize city mobility.
